_meanings:
A
worshipper of Śakti; (the {%Śāktas%}
are generally worshippers of Durgā
representing the female 
personification of divine energy, and the ritual
enjoined to them is of two kinds,
the pure or right-hand ritual  
{#dakziRAcAra#}, and impure or left-hand ritual
{#vAmAcAra#} q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v.).
